nodes.text: The E-851 blaster pistol was a type of blaster pistol notably used by Zorii Bliss on Kijimi.
The E-851 was a quick-draw blaster pistol, making it ideal for underworld criminals such as the Spice Runners of Kijimi. They were made to have minimum recoil, ideal for quick, brutal confrontations.
The E-851 blaster pistol was first identified in the reference book Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker: The Visual Dictionary.
